title: Skilled — Sponsored visa (subclass 176)
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== ​This visa is closed to new applications. Skilled — Sponsored visa (subclass 176) Page Content ​​​The Skilled-Sponsored visa (subclass 176) is closed to new applications. This visa was subject to the Cap and Cease arrangement that took effect on 22 September 2015. Any visa application that was not decided before 22 September 2015 will be taken not to have been made. For more information on the cap and cease arrangement go to Cap and cease ​.​​ Visa holders This information is for people who have been granted a Skilled - Sponsored visa (subclass 176). It explains your rights and obligations. Details What this visa lets you do Details You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws. State and territories might also specify requirements, including: living in the nominating state or territory for a specified minimum time telling the state or territory your address both before and after you arrive in Australia completing surveys and providing other information they ask for after you arrive in Australia. ​ Your obligation Details You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws. State and territories might also specify requirements, including: living in the nominating state or territory for a specified minimum time telling the state or territory your address both before and after you arrive in Australia completing surveys and providing other information they ask for after you arrive in Australia. ​ Tell us if things change Details Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include: changes to your phone number, email, address or passport changes to your relationship status the birth of a child. See how to tell us if your situation changes Sponsor obligations Details As an eligible relative sponsor, you must sign a sponsorship undertaking and agree to provide: adequate accommodation and financial assistance as required to meet your relative's living needs during their first two years in Australia other support, such as childcare, to enable your relative to attend English language classes information and advice (including information about employment in Australia) to help your relative settle in Australia. The two-year period starts from the date your relative enters Australia.

# Skilled — Sponsored visa (subclass 176)

Skilled — Sponsored visa (subclass 176)
Page Content

​​​The Skilled-Sponsored visa (subclass 176) is closed to new applications. This visa was subject to the Cap and Cease arrangement that took effect on 22 September 2015. Any visa application that was not decided before 22 September 2015 will be taken not to have been made.  For more information on the cap and cease arrangement go toCap and cease​.​​

​​​The Skilled-Sponsored visa (subclass 176) is closed to new applications. This visa was subject to the Cap and Cease arrangement that took effect on 22 September 2015. Any visa application that was not decided before 22 September 2015 will be taken not to have been made.  For more information on the cap and cease arrangement go to
Cap and cease
​.​​

## Visa holders

Visa holders

This information is for people who have been granted a Skilled - Sponsored visa (subclass 176). It explains your rights and obligations.

This information is for people who have been granted a Skilled - Sponsored visa (subclass 176). It explains your rights and obligations.
Details

### What this visa lets you do

What this visa lets you do
Details

You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws.

You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws.

State and territories might also specify requirements, including:

State and territories might also specify requirements, including:
- living in the nominating state or territory for a specified minimum time
living in the nominating state or territory for a specified minimum time
- telling the state or territory your address both before and after you arrive in Australia
telling the state or territory your address both before and after you arrive in Australia
- completing surveys and providing other information they ask for after you arrive in Australia. ​
completing surveys and providing other information they ask for after you arrive in Australia. ​

Your obligation

You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws.

- telling the state or territory your address both before and after you arrive in Australia

### Tell us if things change

Tell us if things change
Details

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:
- changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
- changes to your relationship status
changes to your relationship status
- the birth of a child.
the birth of a child.

## Sponsor obligations

Sponsor obligations
Details

As an eligible relative sponsor, you must sign a sponsorship undertaking and agree to provide:

As an eligible relative sponsor, you must sign a sponsorship undertaking and agree to provide:
- adequate accommodation and financial assistance as required to meet your relative's living needs during their first two years in Australia
adequate accommodation and financial assistance as required to meet your relative's living needs during their first two years in Australia
- other support, such as childcare, to enable your relative to attend English language classes
other support, such as childcare, to enable your relative to attend English language classes
- information and advice (including information about employment in Australia) to help your relative settle in Australia.
information and advice (including information about employment in Australia) to help your relative settle in Australia.

The two-year period starts from the date your relative enters Australia.

The two-year period starts from the date your relative enters Australia.
